column5: I fish the Deception Bay/Sen Bay area of Lac Seul and I was wondering If there are any waterfalls in that part of LS. I have heard of one in Scaler, but I am not aware of any in the area I fish.
I dont know where those areas are but in the sactuary about 5 miles east of ear falls there is about a 15 rapids depending on how deep the water is.

The closest " falls" would be pelican falls, where Abrams lake enters Lac Seul ( east of Hudson). Besides the Scaler lake falls , west of Kakabeeka Narrows ,there remains only the falls at the west end of Wapesi bay north of Chamberlain Narrows. There are some high current areas (" rapids") north ( Manitou rapids) and SW ( Crooked "rapids") of Deception light . best regards, JBP
There are also falls where Route River enters Lac Seul. NWO Fishing Bum
There is one in Scaler but I would be very careful if going there. Alot of stumps and rocks just under the surface. Very pretty though
Se bay of Minnitaki, east end of Botsford past Abrams, west end of Sen bay, sometimes the west end of Websters
